semantic_documents.content: Comprehensive payment processing infrastructure for internet businesses. Handles billions of dollars annually with support for credit cards, digital wallets, bank transfers, and local payment methods across 135+ currencies. Features fraud detection, recurring billing, and extensive API integrations.

React/TypeScript for merchant dashboard. Ruby and Scala microservices for payment processing with high availability. PostgreSQL for transactional consistency, MongoDB for flexible event storage. Real-time fraud detection with machine learning.
